Html:
Using Rawr: Mage I've noticed the default item cache includes some +Heal items (as these items also give a modicum of Spellpower).

Would it be possible to add the +Heal value to the tooltip of these items? It would be helpful in identifying healer items, as though some of these may be decent for a DPS caster, it's unlikely a mage would be allowed to greed on one unless all the healers on the run already have better.

An example of such an item would be [Brooch of Nature's Mercy] off Akil'zon in ZA.

Actually, here's a more general request: for all models, display the stats that are ignored in red (or grey, or otherwise differently). That makes it much easier to tell when a particular piece of gear is wasting itemization on stats you don't care about.
